Class MapGenerator

java.lang.Object
com.goblinskeep.app.MapGenerator
public class MapGenerator extends Object
Generates and loads the game map based on a text file.

This class is responsible for:

  • Parsing tile and object data from a map file
  • Spawning goblins, keys, levers, traps, trees, and other game objects
  • Setting the playerâ€™s initial position
  • Providing access to game components like the TileManager, ObjectManager, and Player
It also maintains raw map data for testing and initializes the in-game state based on numeric codes defined in the map file.
